item.description:
Let's get together for some warm cider and toast marshmallows around a backyard campfire and share ghost stories, jokes, and worst date stories! Prizes will be given for the best ghost story, best joke, and best worst date story!

Please bring a chair, a dish to share, and refreshment of your choice. Dress warm.

It will be a fun evening to meet new singles, laugh, and discuss whatever is on your mind!

'YES' RSVPs will receive driving directions to the location.

Event will be postponed in case of inclement weather.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: FRIDAY NITE BACKYARD BONFIRE & POTLUCK
